name: Novice Stance
desc: A balanced, untrained stance that does not specialize in any obvious way.
effect: None

abilities.name: Spiritbound and Spirit
abilities.effect: _Summon_ your Spirit within a valid Arena within Range. You and your spirit may both immediately use an Action [_Discount_ 1], resolving them both this _Turn_.

abilities.name: Beginner's Luck
abilities.trigger: You make an Attack or Defense Roll.
abilities.effect: After determining the final result, reroll one of the dice. This does not change the result, but may allow you to qualify for a _Gambit_.

name: Forceful Stance
desc: A stance focused on overwhelming offense and powerful blows that break through a foe's defenses.
effect: The first time each _Phase_ you successfully inflict _Break_, gain 1 _Momentum_.

abilities.name: Smash
abilities.effect: Use a _Versatile_ or _Heavy_ _Attack_, adding [Pierce 1] and dealing _Bonus Damage_ equal to 1 + the current Phase on a Graze+. On a Hit+, add Break [Focus].

abilities.name: Painful Reminder
abilities.effect: For the remainder of this _Phase_, add [_Pierce_ 2] to all Attacks against the Target.

abilities.name: Wide Open!
abilities.effect: The Target creates an _Opening_. You may not respond to said _Opening_.

name: Steady Stance
desc: A stance focused on unbreakable defense.
effect: While _Guarding_ gain +1 _Guard_ and gain _Advantage_ while _Negating_.

abilities.name: Defensive Posture
abilities.effect: Make an Attack, clear 3 _Stun_, then become _Guarding_.

abilities.name: Form Up
abilities.effect: You or an ally you are _Engaged_ with becomes _Guarding_.
abilities.boost: 1 _Momentum_: You an your ally both become _Guarding_.

abilities.name: Flawless
abilities.effect: All your _Guard_ this _Turn_ is instead _Perfect Guard_.

name: Swift Stance
desc: A stance focused on swift, sudden movements and capitalizing on agility.

abilities.name: Dash
abilities.effect: Gain 1 _Temporary_ _Movement_. Your _Movement_ this _Turn_ is [_Safe_], but you may only use _Mobility_ _Enhancements_ this _Turn_.

abilities.name: Swift Strike
abilities.effect: Make a _Light_ _Attack_ at _Advantage_. You may pay the Cost of this Attack with _Movement_ instead of _Momentum_. This Attack may not trigger _Gambits_.

effect: You may spend up to 2 _Movement_ at _Refresh_ as if it was your _Turn_; this _Movement_ is automatically [_Safe_]. Attacks against you on your _Turn_ have _Disadvantage_.

name: Blaze Stance
desc: A stance specialized in cultivating and creating flames.
effect: Whenever you would inflict _Alight_ you can choose to to instead create a _Blazing_ space adjacent to the Target. If you do, deal +2 _Fire_ _Bonus_ Damage.
special: Once per _Round_ gain 1 _Momentum_ when you start your _Turn_ adjacent to a _Flame_ _Major Source_.

name: Detonation Stance
desc: A stance specialized in detonating flames in violent blasts.
effect: Whenever you would deal _Fire_ Damage you may instead choose to deal _Crush_ Damage. If you do, remove _Alight_ but add _Stun_ equal to half the _Negate_ DC.
special: Whenever you _Hit_+ with an Attack that deals _Fire_ Damage (even if you change it to _Crush_) you may destroy a piece of _Terrain_ adjacent to the Target or in the _Area_.

name: Gale Stance
desc: A stance specialized in bending and shaping the wind.
effect: Once per _Turn_ after making a _Gale_ _Attack_ or using a _Gale_ _Gambit_ you may make a space in or adjacent to the effect's _Area_ _Gusting_. If it is a single-target effect, treat the Target's space as the _Area_.
special: _Gusting_ spaces adjacent to you are always treated as pointing in the direction of your choice. They return to their original direction when you break adjacency.

name: Land Stance
desc: A stance specialized in shaping the earth as if it was clay.
effect: Once per _Turn_ after making a _Land_ _Attack_ or using a _Land_ _Gambit_ you may make an _Earthen_ space in or adjacent to the effect's _Area_ _Uneven Earth_. If it is a single-target effect, treat the Target's space as the _Area_.
special: Inflict an additional 1 _Stun_ whenever you _Hit_+ a Target on _Uneven Earth_.

name: Mountain Stance
desc: A stance specialized in controlling stone with deadly intent.
effect: Once per _Round_ you may make an _Environmental Weapon_ in an _Earthen_ space within Range 4. This _Environmental Weapon_ uses the stats of a _Small Improvised_ Weapon, is made of _Stone_, and has the [_Fragile_] keyword.

name: Storm Stance
desc: A stance specialized in conjuring and controlling bolts of electricity.
effect: Whenever you deal _Lighting_ Damage to a _Shocked_ creature (before they Negate) you may choose to remove _Shocked_ to deal 3 _Lighting_ Damage in a _Burst_ 1 around the Target and inflict _Stun_ 3 on the Target.

name: Tide Stance
desc: A stance specialized in controlling water, using it as a vicious weapon.
effect: Gain an Aqua Ring, which is a _Watersource_ that shares your space, moves with you, and has a maximum value of 4. Whenever you would create a _Watersource_ you may reduce the value placed by 1 to increase the value of your Aqua Ring by 1. Additionally, if you would inflict _Soaked_ you may choose not to to increase the value of your Aqua Ring by 1.
special: Inflict an additional 1 _Stun_ whenever you _Hit_+ a Target if you _Drew_ from your Aqua Ring.

name: Tundra Stance
desc: A stance specialized in controlling snow and ice with ease.
effect: Whenever you would inflict _Frozen_ you can choose to to instead create an _Icy_ space adjacent to the Target. If you do, deal +2 _Cold_ _Bonus_ Damage.
special: Once per _Round_ gain 1 _Momentum_ when you start your _Turn_ adjacent to an _Ice_ _Major Source_.

name: Coiled Serpent Stance
desc: You are constantly wound as tight as a spring, waiting to viciously lunge out at a moment's notice.
special: Whenever you become _Charging_, gain _Poised_.
effect: Whenever you are _Charging_ you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to remove _Charging_ at the end of a creature's _Turn_ rather than the end of the _Phase_, so long as you could remove this _Charging_ at the end of the current _Phase_.

name: Crackling Bolt Stance
desc: You form and fire bolts of lightning near constantly, drawing all electricity in the environment.
effect: Add [_Winding_] to all _Storm_ Attacks that Target a _Shocked_ creature.
special: Whenever you deal _Lightning_ Damage you may remove _Shocked_ as if it was _Vulnerable_.

name: Crashing Stone Stance
desc: You are a true master of boulder-based combat, flinging them with brutal efficiency.
effect: Whenever you would be required to reduce _Forced Movement_ with an _Earth_ ability due to an _Feature's_ property, reduce it by 2 less.
special: Add [_Repeatable_] to _Compress Earth_.

name: Creeping Frost Stance
desc: You freeze the terrain and foes alike, creating a frigid wasteland around you.

respite.special: If you are on a _Icy_ space, inflict _Frozen_ 1 on a creature within Range 4.

effect: Attacks against creatures with _Frozen_ within Range 4 of you gain [_Pierce_ 1].

name: Cunning Fox Stance
desc: You fight with guile and trickery, pushing every possible advantage to better strike down your foes.
effect: After making a _Light_/_Versatile_ _Attack_ against a creature you may convert up to 3 of their _Exposed_/_Enraged_ to _Reeling_ if you had _Advantage_.
special: Deal +1 _Damage_ against creatures with _Enraged_/_Exposed_ when making _Light_/_Versatile_ Attacks.

name: Destructive Blast Stance
desc: Your flame attacks are more a wave of concussive force than true explosion, devastating foes.
effect: The _Explosive Flames_ Gambit has no cost for you.
special: Whenever you use _Explosive Flames_ you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to deal _Crush_ Damage rather than _Fire_.

name: Dripping Veil Stance
desc: The water is a constant shield for you, warding you from all harm.
effect: You may treat all _Water_ _Terrain_ as _Fortified_.
special: Once per Round you may use _Shielding Wave_ for no Cost and may freely use the Boost.

name: Endless Twister Stance
desc: Your are a master of pushing and pulling the wind, creating vicious vortices wherever you go.

respite.special: Make up to 2 spaces adjacent to you _Gusting_.

effect: _Gusting_ spaces adjacent to you may be treated as pointing in the direction of your choice and ignore _Fleeting_. Additionally, you treat _Windy_ spaces as if they are _Fortified_.

name: Erupting Flame Stance
desc: You are a master of sudden, violent blasts of flame, building to large and larger blasts.
effect: Gain an Eruption Dice, which is a d6. Every time you make an _Area_ Attack that deals _Fire_ Damage either increase its value by 1 or reset it to 1. If you reset its value, you may add an additional X spaces to the _Area_, where X is the die's value prior to the reset. These additional spaces must be contiguous with the original _Area_. You may always choose the reset option, even if the dice has a value of 1.

name: Floating Butterfly Stance
desc: You are constantly in motion, shifting across the battlefield with unparalleled grace.
effect: Whenever you would [_Safe_] Move you may remove [_Safe_] to gain 1 _Stamina_.

name: Focusing Torch Stance
desc: Your flames burn brighter and hotter, searing through defenses.
effect: Your Attacks that deal _Fire_ Damage gain [_Pierce_ 1] if you have _Alight_. While _Charging_, you may choose to gain _Alight_ 1 at the end of each _Phase_.
special: During _Phases_ you were _Charging_, you instead have _Resistance_ 2 (_Fire_).

name: Furious Bison Stance
desc: You dominate the battlefield with wide, sweeping strikes, moving forward with constant rage.
effect: Once per _Round_, you may remove up to 3 _Enraged_ when you make a _Charged Attack_ to add an equivalent amount of _Bonus Damage_. Regardless, gain +1 _Guard_ while _Enraged_ and _Charging_.
special: Whenever you begin _Charging_, you may choose to do so in a reckless fashion. If you do, gain _Tough_ and _Enraged_ 1. Unless you take Damage before resolving the effect, gain a +1 _Bonus_ when resolving the effect or 1 _Momentum_.

name: Guiding Shepard Stance
desc: You guide friends and foes alike across the battlefield, herding their movements.
effect: Whenever you inflict _Forced Movement_ on an ally or grant a _Free Turn_ where they _Move_ you may _Gift_ them 1 _Momentum_.
special: _Sheparding Blow_ has no cost when targeting an ally.

name: Greedy Rodent Stance
desc: You are an armory of the impromptu, finding weapons in the least likely of places.

respite.special: Use _Swift Search_ at no Cost. Ignore [_Taxing_] when used in this way.

effect: You do not need the requisite _Open Hands_ to _Wield_ an _Improvised Weapon_, but must make an Attack with it by the end of the current _Turn_ when _Wielded_ in this way.
special: Never gain an _Opening_ when using _Draw/Stow_. When you start to _Wield_ an _Opportune_ Weapon, gain 1 _Temporary_ _Momentum_.

name: Infinite Skate Stance
desc: You glide across the battlefield with frantic ease, using the ice to propel and protect.
effect: While making [_Rush_] Movement you may always move into _Ice_ spaces, ignoring the normal limitations of [_Rush_]. You must maintain the same straight line for all [_Rush_] Movement that is not on an _Ice_ space.
special: The first _Ice_ space you enter each _Turn_ does not count against your Movement.

name: Lifting Wind Stance
desc: Your wind elevates and accelerates allies, molding the battlefield for their success.
effect: When an ally directly benefits from _Windy_ Terrain you placed or you target them with a non-Damaging _Gale_ ability you may _Gift_ them 1 _Momentum_.
special: _Updraft_ spaces within Range 4 of you ignore _Fleeting_.

name: Lightning Caller Stance
desc: You look to the skies with your attacks, relying on predictable but powerful attacks.
effect: Whenever you deal _Lightning_ Damage with a _Hazard_ you may remove an additional 2 _Vulnerable_. If the triggering Effect is not an Attack you may still remove 2 _Vulnerable_ as if it was one.

name: Pack Leader Stance
desc: You are a cunning commander, creating openings for allies and helping them exploit them.
effect: While in this _Stance_, reduce the cost of _Flank_ by 1. Whenever you use _Flank_ inflict _Vulnerable_ 1 before resolving the Attack.
special: Allies may remove an additional _Vulnerable_ whenever attacking a creature that is adjacent to you or that you have used _Flank_ or _Pack Punishment_ on this _Turn_.

name: Proud Osprey Stance
desc: You excel in a one on one battle, keeping your foe locked against you at every turn.

respite.special: Gain 1 _Momentum_ if you are only adjacent to a _Marked_ Target.

effect: Deal +1/2 Damage with _Minor_/_Major_ Attacks against creatures you have _Marked_ when no other creatures are adjacent to either of you.
special: You may only have a single creature _Marked_ at any given time; if you would inflict _Marked_ when you already have a creature _Marked_ you must either remove _Marked_ from the original creature or inflict nothing.

name: Patient Hunter Stance
desc: You focus your attention on a singular creature, finding the perfect opening to take them down.

respite.special: Inflict _Studied_ 1 twice within Range 12. You may gain _Hobbled_ 2 to instead inflict _Studied_ 1 four times.

effect: You may remove _Studied_ as if it as _Exposed_.

name: Quaking Earth Stance
desc: Your every step shakes the earth, keeping your foes off-balance.
effect: You may use Localized Tremor as a _Reaction_ that triggers when a _Phase_ begins, rather than an _Action_. When you do so, it instead has a Cost of 0 _Momentum_ and the effect ends at the end of the current _Phase_. Increase the cost of each subsequent use in this way by 1, and reduce it by 1 (minimum 0) at _Respite_.
special: Your _Groundsource_ Attacks always inflict an additional _Vulnerable_ 1 on Targets on _Uneven Earth_.

name: Rising Spire Stance
desc: You make the battlefield a perilous, dangerously sharp field.

respite.special: Make two unoccupied _Earthen_ spaces within Range 3 _Jagged_.

effect: All creatures within Range 3 of you take an additional 1 Damage from all sources while they are on a _Jagged_ space.

name: Roaring Lion Stance
desc: You are a bombastic and inspiring warrior, leading your allies as you fight.

respite.special: Gain _Vigor_ equal to 1+the number of creatures you have _Marked_.

effect: Once per _Turn_ when a _Marked_ creature attacks you, you may gain _Courageous_ 1 or grant _Courageous_ 1 to an ally within Range 3.

name: Rousing Songbird Stance
desc: You are a font of positivity, inspiring allies forward to fight ever harder.
effect: Allies treat you as adjacent for the purposes of _Joyful_ when they are within Range 3 of you. Allies within this Range may remove 2 _Joyful_ rather than 1 when they end their _Turn_ within this area, gaining the effects of both.
special: Allies within _Range_ 3 of you may remove 1 _Courageous_/_Joyful_ at any time to gain 1 _Temporary_ _Stamina_. They may only use this ability once per Turn.

name: Spreading Cinders Stance
desc: You bring flames and ruin, scorching the battlefield with every step.
effect: _Blazing_ and _Roaring_ spaces within Range 3 of you do not have _Fleeting_.

name: Stalwart Bastion Stance
desc: You are an unwavering guard, defending your allies against all slights.
effect: Once per Round when an adjacent ally is Attacked you may immediately swap spaces with them. You become the target of the Attack. If the Attack had an _Area_ and your ally is no longer in it they are no longer a target; otherwise, add [_Glancing_]. Inflict _Marked_ on the Attacker.

name: Stone Lock Stance
desc: You specialize in fighting within an earthen shell, shrugging off blows as you attack.

respite.special: Gain 2 _Vigor_, or 4 _Vigor_ if you have _Stone Armor_.

special: While in this _Stance_ and adjacent to an _Earth_ _Minor Source_ your _Vigor_ stacks. If you are ever not adjacent to an _Earth_ _Minor Source_ lose all _Vigor_.

name: Stinging Wasp Stance
desc: You are exceptional at making swift attacks and sliding away before foes can retaliate.
effect: Whenever you start a Move, you may inflict _Vulnerable_ 1 on an adjacent Target.
special: Up to three times per _Round_, gain 1 _Momentum_ when you Attack a unique foe that hasn't taken a _Turn_ this _Round_.

name: Flowing Sea Stance
desc: You pull water in and out, pushing and pulling foes like ships on the sea.
effect:
While in this Stance gain a Tide Dice, which is a d6. After you would _Push_/_Pull_ with a Tide ability, increment the dice by 1. The next time you do the opposite _Push_/_Pull_ with a Tide ability, either increment the dice or gain one of the following bonus:
* If the triggering effect is a _Pull_, reduce the value of the dice by 1 to add _Vulnerable_ 2.
* If the triggering effect is a _Push_, reduce the value of the dice by 1 (2 if it is an _Area_ Attack) to add _Forceful_.
* If it was _Push_ or _Pull_, you may reduce the value of the dice by  to remove 3 additional _Vulnerable_ as a part of the _Attack_.

You may only increment the dice once per Ability.

name: Watching Owl Stance
desc: You keep a keen eye on the battlefield, providing opportunities and openings to all allies.

respite.special: Use _Scouting_ at no Cost. Either yourself or an ally within Range 4 may Move 1. Any creature with _Studied_ treats this Movement as [_Safe_].

effect: You may choose to inflict _Studied_ when removing _Vulnerable_. Additionally, if you Attack a creature and leave at least 1 _Studied_ on them, inflict _Vulnerable_ 1.

name: Summoner's Stance
desc: A stance centered on effectively manifesting and battling with your spirit.
effect: You roll your Spirit's _Manifest_ effect at _Advantage_. You may use _Spirit Summon_ at _Respite_ by paying 1 _Momentum_, and may use _Partnership_ once per _Round_ for free.
